column4: hi everyone. I have got oubuntu 10.04LTS. My update manager can`t update the following package: http://ppa.launchpad.net/plaxx/random-fixes/ubuntu/dists/lucid/main/binary-i386/Packages.gz even if I try with the aptline
what is the error you get?
it simply doesnt add the repository
well, what is the error-message you get?
and what is the command you are trying to run
nothing, it just dont work. I cant add the source, the field stays grey.
what you are trying to do? what command you are trying to run?
if you try to add the line you pasted, it's not going to work
right
so what you are trying to do? add new ppa?
yes
how did you try to add it?
i got the message : Failed to fetch http://ppa.launchpad.net/plaxx/random-fixes/ubuntu/dists/lucid/main/binary-i386/Packages.gz  404  Not Found
by running what command?
update manager ,check
ok, it means that your ppa is not working. Why you need to add this ppa?
to be honest, I dont know, but my systems suggested it so i thought I better do it.
hmmh. interesting
where did you try to download it?
by the package installer
please copy-paste what did you do and whole output to pastebin.ubuntu.com
thanx for your support. I am new to Linux and therefore a bit slow. I got the problem solved. Have a nice weekend.
